ARABIC: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I only created jinn and man to worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I have not created the jinns and men but to worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I created the jinn and humans for nothing else but that they may serve Me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have created jinn and human beings only that they might worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And I created the jinns and men, only for them to worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And I created not the Jinn and mankind except that they should worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I have not created the jinn and the men except that they should serve Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I have not created jinn and mankind except to serve Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: I created the jinn and humankind only that they might worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I created the jinn and mankind only so that they might worship Me:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And have not created the Jinn and mankind but that they should worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I did not create the jinn and the humans except that they may worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: I have only created Jinns and men, that they may serve Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And I (Allah) created not the jinns and humans except they should worship Me (Alone).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I have not created mankind and jinn except to worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I did not create the jinn and the humans except to worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:56] And I did not create the jinn and mankind except that they may worship Me: the fact that disbelievers do not worship [God] does not contradict this [statement], since a purpose does not have to be realised [in an   act, for it to be valid], as when you may say: ‘I sharpened this pencil in order to write with it’, even though you might not actually write with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (I created the jinn and humankind only that they might worship Me) to worship me; this concerns only His obedient servants; and it is also said: had Allah created them for worship, they would not have disobeyed him for a blink of an eye. 'AN Ibn Abi Talib said: I have not created them except to command them and entrust them with legal responsibility; and it is also said that this means: I created the jinn and humankind only that they might declare My divine Oneness and worship Me.
